website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight helmet is on the lower end of POC's price range.
pros: Lightweight yet reasonably sturdy with ample ventilation for notable comfort
Slim profile compared to other POC helmets
SPIN technology protects head in case of impact
cons: Not as well ventilated as other POC helmets

customer_reviews.title: Authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I received the helmet in its box, but with the seal broken and no protection on as I have seen in unboxing videos. The helmet was just loose in the box. It really bothers me that the seal on the box was cut, so it had been opened by someone else. The entire appearance makes me question it’s authenticity. Will likely return due to this reason. Now I know to buy directly from the manufacturer. How disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with a streamlined design
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this helmet in sulphite yellow for the high visibility factor and was surprised that with the matte finish the color looks good without screaming neon highlighter. The design features a streamlined dome so you don't get the bobble head look and the vents offer plenty of ventilation for air circulation. The fit with the eps liner is comfortable and the chin strap works well without tangling up to this point. The style of this helmet puts it at home for multi-purpose riding and would be a good choice if you only had one helmet. Overall, great style and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burns

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to try a POC helmet, but the price tags were a little too high for me. When I saw this one at a reasonable price I decided to get one. Since owning it, I'm sold. I've always worn Bell helmets since other brands I've tried didn't fit or feel comfortable on my noggin. This one happens to fit comfortably with hardly noticeable weight. Appears comparable to an aero helmet and the high gloss shell looks sick. I'm shaving off a star because I wish it came with spare pads, and the front vents aren't much of a garage for your shields depending on what you have.
customer_reviews.author: RB68

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these POC helmets. They fit and vent well. My head does feel safe and secure for a road bike helmet, but their true protective quality and product claims have not been tested yet - I haven't crashed with one.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: I guess my ears are too low?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the straps around the ears do not adjust at all - my earlobes were being pushed up by the straps and it is not possible to adjust this so i had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and visible (AVIP)
customer_reviews.text: Started biking again but decided I needed a helmet. I have a black bike and almost went for the black version of this helmet to match but decided on the high visibility version for safety reasons. Fits well and has a POC version of MIPS inside that supposedly makes it even safer...once your head starts smacking things. Ventilates well and the adjuster on the back snugs it up with or without a hat on. Wish it had a visor
customer_reviews.author: Josepí

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and quality. Straps do not adjust side to side.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the helmet is great. It fits nice and would have gotten a five star rating but the straps are not adjustable for the placement of the under the ear pieces. The side pieces are to low to my liking and can't be adjusted. That isn't good when trying to fit the helmet to different size heads.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these helmets in different colors. The are light and protective at all times. The liner inside the helmet, after a year of use, unfortunately won't stay attached. POC's the manufacturer responded, finally, and has been helpful! Every SINGLE time you get on your bike wear a helmet. Don't wipe out like I did and learn that lesson, the "hard" way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the all-around helmet! Race, commute, cross! Lightweight and plenty of ventilation, the POC. Omne is a super great value for the money! The Omne Air features a single-density EPS foam liner, as well as POC’s SPIN technology, which is designed to protect the head from oblique impacts. A comparable competing technology is MIPS, but whereas MIPS is a plastic liner, SPIN is comprised of a series of silicone pads that replace the foam pads in other helmets.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nino

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Construction
customer_reviews.text: I've contimplated on purchasing a new bike helmet, after doing my research I decided to try POC & I can now say this is a really great high quality 👌 product. The construction, fit, comfort all come United in a perfect package. If you're in the market for a helmet give it a try & make sure you measure your head size to get the correct fit.
customer_reviews.author: I Am The Entity In Me

customer_reviews.title: POC Omne Air Spin great helmet, best protection, i crashed in one so i know!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet fits perfect although sized a bit small so ended with a large. Protection is superb! I crashed and went over the bars and landed on my front right temple, helmet took brunt of the force, thank goodness no concussion. I have bought a second one since and highly recomment these! Thanks POC for a superb helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Omne Air Weird on the Ears?
customer_reviews.text: A very god helmet. It has a slightly bulbous look, but sits on the head nicely. The biggest issue many had with the Omne Air was the fit of the ear straps. They do indeed fall in a funny spot over the ears. I’m not crazy about that, but the helmet is otherwise comfortable, and is definitely protective.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Maulucci

customer_reviews.title: Isn't cycling an outdoor sport?
customer_reviews.text: The matte finish and light color of this helmet was scuffed and compromised after just wearing it for two rides. It is my opinion that if I am purchasing something for an outdoor sport AND spending so much on the product that it withstands normal wear and tear. I do take care of stuff that I get, but didn't stand a chance with this item. Initially, I was very excited because the helmet matches my bike exactly, but I will never pay more for POC again.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these POC helmets. They fit and vent well. My head does feel safe and secure for a road bike helmet, but their true protective quality and product claims have not been tested yet - I haven't crashed with one.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but such a bummer
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fit my head very nicely and felt like I wasn't wearing anything, however the ear loops and their inability to be lowered made it impossible to get it to rest on my head with my ears being comfortable. You can kind of adjust the ear loops but it doesn't change the position enough to not make them tug where my ear lobe meets my jaw.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McDonald

customer_reviews.title: nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife, really nice looking and well made, Seems to run a little larger then their sizing charts say, had to return the first one for a smaller size, which fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the sizing of the helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large helmet - it fit too big I ordered the medium helmet - it fit too small I’m a size 56 or 57 I was looking forward to this helmet.. I’m extremely disappointed with this purchase. I returned the items.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lightweight for long runs.
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality feature and excellent fitting. Great for typical hot days in my area, allowing cool air to flow through.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet. Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet feels great on my head. I thought it was too big, but adjusting it to fit is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short strap
customer_reviews.text: Great looking comfortable helmet, but the straps around the ears are short and not adjustable. Bummer, had to return it andrew hope the mediums has a longer strap
customer_reviews.author: David Tarcali

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, stylish, feels solid and safe. I just wish the the straps could adjust to move the plastic piece right up to my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Masterfully Engineered, Beautifully Designed
customer_reviews.text: The POC Omne Air is solid, lightweight, masterfully engineered, and is beautifully designed. The air flows easily and sometimes I forget I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very light, very comfortable. Orange on back is very visible, would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Braud

customer_reviews.title: Chin strap around ears
customer_reviews.text: Chinstrap around ears doesn't fit as it should. I had an old Bell Ghisallo that the head shape fits me better and I still prefer that one. Good air flow though. I bought the white with white inner foam also for coolness temperature wise.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frost

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing helmet. Lightweight and fast. Super comfy and I like how it looks. I would recommend that you buy a size up if you're on the border in between sizes. I have a 55cm head and the small was too small (ear straps didn't go over the ears) but the medium is perfect. 10/10 will buy POC again.
customer_reviews.author: John Tepper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable helmet I've owned. Love it and will by from POC again.
customer_reviews.author: Vinson Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit is very adjustable. Keeps my head cool and safe
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Haven’t fallen yet so not sure how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Super light, great fit, affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this helmet. The price of this one compared to other POC helmets is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, fits well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lex&Bros.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a s/m matte white helmet. Came quickly and is true to size. I really love the design of the helmet. Great for commuting and working out/ racing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Freeman

customer_reviews.title: looks good, feels gooood
customer_reviews.text: great fit, lightweight and easy to clean despite of it matte finish, and it doesn't hurt that it looks good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, good Vent and low profile
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, good Vent and low profile, Thank you for fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil F.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: The overall construction is good. Relatively light weight with good ventilation but the straps are short and not adjustable..
customer_reviews.author: Bochie

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet, slightly heavier than my other helmet , a Poc Ventral, but not an issue, less bubbly and super cool on the looks .
customer_reviews.author: JORGE RUIZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, good quality, super light, super comfy, amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: straps shorts
customer_reviews.text: Straps short, my ears stick in the straps and it has no adjustment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it , will be getting a different color next summer
customer_reviews.author: Andres Mangones

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for, this is a solid helmet. Light, fits great, and has good ventilation. Only issue I have is that my Oakleys does not stay on the helmet. Wish they added the rubber stays at this model as well
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Isidoro

product_meta.title: POC, Omne Air Spin Bike Helmet for Commuters and Road Cycling, Lightweight, Breathable and Adjustable
feature_bullets: COMMUTING AND ROAD: All-around protection for everyday use; Multipurpose helmet designed for road cycling, from weekend rides to the daily commute

PROTECTIVE TECHNOLOGY: Optimized-density EPS liner for crash protection; Patent pending silicone pad technology system, SPIN (Shearing Pad Inside), uses innovative materials and design to complement POC's whole helmet approach
STREAMLINED DESIGN: Slim profile for a clean aesthetic; Lightweight and breathable construction for comfort and functionality on longer rides
ADJUSTABLE FIT: Lightweight 360° size adjustment system inside the helmet allows you to fine-tune the fit; One-handed dial for quick and easy adjusting
SUPERIOR COMFORT: Easily adjustable precision straps are molded into the helmet liner for added safety; Extra comfort for longer rides
